Ta,

I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Lucy, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://royalrehab.com.au/social-work/
https://royalrehab.com.au/speech-pathologist/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
@rica Thanks! 

The social work one is working for me. 
The Speech Pathology one is not. Can you please double check and once it's loading please notify the client? 

Thanks,

@heath done, kindly check. Thanks!

https://royalrehab.com.au/social-work/
https://royalrehab.com.au/speech-pathologist/

Logged 5mins to Harvest

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body: @rica a couple more like last time please.

Hey Heath!

Brittany from Practice Edge has been assisting with building these webpages for us:

https://royalrehab.com.au/social-work/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/social-work/>

https://royalrehab.com.au/speech-pathologist/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/speech-pathologist/>

They’ll need the below telehealth pop-up too:



For Social Work,
Heading – Social Work is available via telehealth!

Body – same as above

CTA – Call us 02 9808 9369

For Speech Pathology,
Heading – Speech Pathology is available via telehealth!

Body – same as above

CTA – Call us 02 9808 9369


Thanks heaps!
Lucy

On 17 Aug 2021, at 9:45 am, Lucy Avati <lucy.avati@royalrehab.com.au <mailto:lucy.avati@royalrehab.com.au>> wrote:

Hey Heath,

Hope you’re doing well and are enjoying the sunshine.

Given government restrictions, and as part of our Google Ads campaign, Royal Rehab wants to promote its telehealth offering on our website in the form of a gradient tile. A break out box would be great so it stands out and so we can easily switch it off once telehealth is over.

If I may please request it for the below webpages using the text provided:

Sexuality Services

The Sexuality Service is available via telehealth! This is a great alternative to face-to-face consultations if you live in a remote or rural area, live a busy life or are impacted by Government restrictions. Stay connected, stay motivated and keep working towards your goals.

Call us 02 9808 9205

Clinical Therapies

https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/clinical-therapies/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/clinical-therapies/>

Our clinical therapies are available via telehealth! This is a great alternative to face-to-face consultations if you live in a remote or rural area, live a busy life or are impacted by Government restrictions. Stay connected, stay motivated and keep working towards your goals.

Call us on 02 9808 9369

BICRT, SOS, In-Voc.

https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/brain-injury-rehabilitation/brain-injury-community-rehab/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/brain-injury-rehabilitation/brain-injury-community-rehab/>

Brain Injury Community Rehab is available via telehealth! This is a great alternative to face-to-face consultations if you live a busy life or are impacted by Government restrictions. Stay connected, stay motivated and keep working towards your goals.

Call us on 02 9809 9000

https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/spinal-injury-services/nsw-spinal-outreach-service/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/spinal-injury-services/nsw-spinal-outreach-service/>

https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/spinal-injury-services/in-vocational-rehabilitation/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/spinal-injury-services/in-vocational-rehabilitation/>

The Spinal Outreach Service and In-Voc are available via telehealth! This is a great alternative to face-to-face consultations if you live in a remote or rural area, live a busy life or are impacted by Government restrictions. Stay connected, stay motivated and keep working towards your goals.

Call us on 02 9808 9666

Public Outpatients

https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/public-outpatient-clinics/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/public-outpatient-clinics/>

Services at our public outpatient clinics are available via telehealth! This is a great alternative to face-to-face consultations if you live in a remote or rural area, live a busy life or are impacted by Government restrictions. Stay connected, stay motivated and keep working towards your goals.

Call us on 02 9808 9218

Stepping On

https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/stepping-on/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/rehab-services/supports-home-and-community/stepping-on/>

Stepping On is available via telehealth! This is a great alternative to face-to-face consultations if you live in a remote or rural area, live a busy life or are impacted by Government restrictions. Stay connected, stay motivated and keep working towards your goals.

Call us on 02 9808 9685


And for the gradient tile/breakout box to look like this one with the following amendments:

‘JOIN OUR TELEHEALTH SERVICE’ instead of ‘JOIN THE ENQUIRIES’

Using the phone numbers provided for each service in the above, ‘Call us on 02 XXXX XXXX’ instead of ‘SEND YOUR REQUEST’

<image001.png>


Please shout out if there are any questions.

Thanks heaps,
Lucy

<image002.png>
